display_long_description:
Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

[media]

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

[media]

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

[media]

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

[media]

# **CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED**

[media]

Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393687_512109028220024_8255635767100546886_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lbF3NwmOolIQ7kNvwGQeHDv&_nc_oc=AdltrSHL_W-hiDPvGtgfDhhTObSSjm5JgWCrpBT3B8alSUWv_oFIWShJkUU-W-ZkI9U&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qSDNChok1xbB9dF64aLcmA&oh=00_AfQ8sWnFtftef_inNJRI9JvK7QoCXnzp7E9AUpPgJByW7w&oe=6880C176)

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393292_972139874890841_7067035628286260950_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=l2R05aWNhfwQ7kNvwFjaiRJ&_nc_oc=Adlv8bLDJ73IL5sjenQMP8Jp9-XfZZ6AGXuVPUv28NT8zZOppMgpCixGAWEMSeQ2sho&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qSDNChok1xbB9dF64aLcmA&oh=00_AfQk9kRPlhST80XghhLjD6lcRjN3KLqwKxotn8ifPnlC9Q&oe=6880D329)

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473391906_1043942824415838_4920723583868365724_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Nec7zP_9xlQQ7kNvwHQLaBG&_nc_oc=Adlkxxbzb6nTVY2m6ykSnQk_VHXzCq2VX9Z2h3YmSI2pTubXZgxBxw73L5tyOA6BVuE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qSDNChok1xbB9dF64aLcmA&oh=00_AfT1XhIejO0W_-08t0Yi_ZhxIakxa-ElQzx7ewhlw_I18w&oe=6880E31D)
